districts.description: Largely inhabited by warforged laborers and miserable workers of other races

taverns.name: Red Hammer
desc: Sharn’s only tavern catering specifically to warforged

industry.name: House Cannith maintains a massive forgehold in the depths
industry.desc: Where Baron Merrix d’Cannith conducts his arcane experiments

districts.description: A maze of tunnels and tenements carved into the stones
